name: Display Current Author on Menu
author: Riyad Arefin

sections.description:
This simple plugin allows users to display current author name on menu after logged in. Ideal for Multi Author Sites.

Just add [display-author] shortcode to your menu’s menu item label and you are good to go.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

Search and install from your admin dashboard

or

  1. Unzip and Upload the display-current-author-on-menu folder to your plugin directory.

  2. Activate it. Paste [display-author] short-code on which menu you want.
sections.faq:
What should i do after activating the plugin?

Add [display-author] shortcode to your menu’s menu item level where you want to display the name.
sections.changelog:
0.1.1

  • Tested with higher WordPress versions.
  • Some bug fixed.
  • Compatible to 4.5.2

0.0.1

  • Initial Release

short_description: Tiny plugin that allows you to display current author's name(Display Name) on menu.
description:
